search.title: Photoresist
search.snippet: A photoresist (also known simply as a resist) is a light-sensitive material used in several processes, such as photolithography and photoengraving, to

search.title: Photolithography
search.snippet: formed in the photoresist. Ultraviolet (UV) light is typically used. Photolithography is the most common method for the semiconductor fabrication of

search.title: Semiconductor device fabrication
search.snippet: Semiconductor device fabrication is the process used to manufacture semiconductor devices, typically integrated circuits (ICs) such as microprocessors
